start.text: You awaken in a dark room. A faint red light flickers in the corner. What do you do?

options.look: You see a terminal and a door. The terminal has a blinking cursor.

open door.text: The door is locked. You need a code.

use terminal.text: You approach the terminal. Type 'help' for a list of commands.

help.text: Available commands: look, open door, use terminal, exit.

exit.text: You have exited the game. Thanks for playing!

success.text: You found the code and escaped the room. You are free!

failure.text: You were trapped forever in the dark room.
